text.en: You have perfected all the precious qualities of discipline and learning, and hold all the classes of Buddha’s teaching,
text.en-trans: ten khé yönten kün dzok denö chang

text.en: Graced with the blessing of the lama Mañjuśrī, you are a vidyādhara master
text.en-trans: jamyang lamé jin tob rigpa dzin

text.en: Supreme at conveying the definitive secret teaching of Dzogpachenpo—the Vajra Essence.
text.en-trans: ngé sang dorjé nyingpö shingta chok

text.en: Glorious lama, at your feet we pray!
text.en-trans: palden lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings, so our life and practice may reach their fullest extent,
text.en-trans: tsé dang drubpa ta ru chinpa dang

text.en: And we may realize the fundamental nature of mind!
